item.description:
This event open to all kayak types as well as canoes

High Tide at the Squamscott River RR Bridge - 3:12 pm

We'll meet at Chapman's Landing off of Rt. 108 Stratham NH and paddle up the Squamscott River into downtown Exeter with the flood tide, and paddle back on the ebb. Bring a snack and water or other beverage as we'll stop at the town landing in Exeter and have a short picnic in the park. Afterwards, we  will paddle back to original launch site at Chapman's Landing.

After the paddle we'll stop for dinner at a local restaurant or pizzeria, so bring some $$ if you wish to join us.

Life vests aka PFDs must be worn when paddling with this group

Directions: Follow Rte. 108 North from Stratham or South from Newmarket. Chapman's landing is well marked & next to the metal bridge over river.

Google Maps link below for directions to Chapman's Landing Boat Launch

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=d&hl=en&saddr=&daddr=60+College+Road%2C+Stratham%2C+NH+03885%2C+us
item.name: Squamscott River to Downtown Exeter Paddle
